overview: Selfie Academy's dream couple, Anabell and Romeo are the most popular influencers in the country. They have a joint account and need 12.763 to reach one million, which would be a national record. During a cozy date night at the movies, Anabell makes a strange discovery: She finds an engagement ring in the popcorn box. In the crossfire of flashing cell phones, Romeo gets down on one knee. They are on cloud nine, along with their followers, and have no clue that in a few hours their perfect life turns into a nightmare.
title: Selfie Academy
